name: inconsistently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not stay the same: She acted inconsistently. He has played inconsistently in recent tournaments. The court decision is vague and inconsistently worded. See
inconsistent
More examplesFewer examplesThe rules have been applied inconsistently.The events were inconsistently reported in the different newspapers. A fee is being inconsistently charged.The smartphone was also found to perform inconsistently in rendering colors in dim light conditions.
